project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would help increase rubber production through rehabilitation and expansion on eight Government rubber estates, seven of which were included in the First Rubber Project (879-BA), and establish a new estate (3,000 ac) at Sonsin. The project would include 6,100 ac of replantings to replace overaged trees and new plantings of over 4,900 ac. Also, 4,500 ac of rubber planted under the First Rubber Project would be brought to maturity. Provision has been made for procurement of materials and equipment, processing facilities, vehicles and housing. Technical assistance and training under the project would help strengthen the Rubber Section (Plantation Crop Division of the Agriculture Corporation in the Ministry of Agriculture and Forest) in all aspects of modern rubber production and expand the program of research.
